function.name: dishWashing_startCourse
function.description: This function is used to start a specific course on the dishwasher.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to start the course.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to start the course.

mode.description: The mode or course to start on the dishwasher.
